Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.workers

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.workers.Worker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
WorkerApollo, WorkerArtemis, WorkerAthena, WorkerAtlas, WorkerChronus, WorkerDemeter, WorkerHephaestus, WorkerHera, WorkerHestia, WorkerMinotaur, WorkerPan, WorkerPrometheus, WorkerTriton, WorkerZeus
public abstract class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

  • Constructor Details

    • Worker

      public Worker​(java.lang.String idWorker, int coordX, int coordY)
      Initialize the worker's coordinates and insert him in the map
      Parameters:
      idWorker - worker name
      coordX - row coordinate of the worker in the map
      coordY - column coordinate of the worker in the map

  • Method Details

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove()
      Verify that the worker can move according to the rules of the game
      Returns:
      true if can move

    • canBuild

      public boolean canBuild()
      Verify that the worker can build (only for Apollo, Hephaestus, Hestia, Prometheus)
      Returns:
      true if can build

    • changePosition

      public void changePosition​(int newX, int newY)
      Change the worker position with the two new coordinates
      Parameters:
      newX - new row coordinate of the worker in the map
      newY - new column coordinate of the worker in the map

    • canDoAgain

      public boolean canDoAgain​(int x, int y)
      Verify that the worker can move (Artemis) or build (Demeter) again
      Parameters:
      x - row coordinate where the worker can't move/build
      y - column coordinate where the worker can't move/build
      Returns:
      true if can do again

    • canPush

      public boolean canPush​(int x, int y)
      Verify that the worker Minotaur can push the worker in that cell
      Parameters:
      x - row coordinate of the worker that must be pushed
      y - column coordinate of the worker that must be pushed
      Returns:
      true if can push the other worker

    • buildBlock

      public void buildBlock​(int buildX, int buildY)
      Build a block in the the map
      Parameters:
      buildX - row coordinate of the building
      buildY - column coordinate of the building

    • specialBuild

      public void specialBuild​(int buildX, int buildY)
      Build a cupola (Atlas) or 2 blocks (Hephaestus) in the the map
      Parameters:
      buildX - row coordinate of the building
      buildY - column coordinate of the building
